definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: It says they also tried to silence the victims' relatives with bribes and threats.
sentences.chinese: 並且威逼利誘受難者家屬保持沉默。

sentences.english: But families at Fort Hood said afterwards they ­appreciated Obama's visit.
sentences.chinese: 但在胡德堡家屬們隨後都表示感激奧巴馬來訪。

sentences.english: This must be co-signed by a family member.
sentences.chinese: 這份記錄還必須由一位家屬的共同簽名。

sentences.english: The Democratic Presidential hopeful plans to visit the fallen officier's family.
sentences.chinese: 這位民主黨候選人希望能夠慰問死者的家屬。

sentences.english: Since then, the military has given little information about its investigation to the Chens, immigrants who speak no English.
sentences.chinese: 美國軍方几乎不給死者家屬有關死因調查信息。

sentences.english: And we also had the privilege of meeting with some of their families, as well as some of the courageous survivors.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有幸會見了部分罹難者家屬和無畏的倖存者。

sentences.english: Comrade Wang and his families have been transferred to Shanghai recently.
sentences.chinese: 王同志和他的家屬最近已調到上海去了。

sentences.english: For deaths not designated karoshi the family gets next to nothing.
sentences.chinese: 而不被認爲是過勞死的死者家屬幾乎什麼也得不到。

sentences.english: Emergency surgical repair was suggested but declined by the patient and her family.
sentences.chinese: 需要進行急診外科修補但遭到患者和家屬的拒絕。

sentences.english: Schools do not invite students' family members to accompany them to study.
sentences.chinese: 學校不邀請留學生家屬來校陪讀。

sentences.english: Hospital is with the community to to provide the support of positive mental state society patient family members.
sentences.chinese: 醫院和社區對病人家屬要提供積極的心理社會支持。

sentences.english: Family members accompanying students shall apply for L visa only.
sentences.chinese: 外國留學生的陪讀家屬，應作爲探親者申請L簽證。

sentences.english: Chan said that patients and their families really magical drug.
sentences.chinese: 患者及其家屬贊稱此藥真神奇。

sentences.english: On behalf of the American people, I express my deepest condolences to the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我代表好國人仄易遠背遇易者家屬暗示最深切的慰唁。

sentences.english: Family members mourned the loss of their loved ones at the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 家屬在世貿中心悼念死難者。

sentences.english: The families of British embassy staff have left Iran.
sentences.chinese: 英國使館人員的家屬已經離開伊朗。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to be present/to be on the scene
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
